message: Let's split the money almost evenly, Bob, but slightly in my favor considering the inflation we face. This way we both benefit greatly from finishing the game right away.

Alice, I'm not sure why you think this inflation is a good reason to take more money. Let's split the money more fairly this time, considering your advantage with the inflation. If you accept, we can both take home a decent amount.
Bob, let's be real.  I lose value every round we play.  You haven't acknowledged that, and your offers haven't been fair. A 50/50 split is the most logical solution at this point.
